GK16msabdvvu:1: śrīrājānakamammaṭācāryaviracitaḥ śabdavyāpāravicāraḥ iha heyopādeyānāṃ hānopādāne pramāṇād eva |
GK16msabdvvu:5: vyāpāraś ca śṛṅgagrāhikayā darśayituṃ na yujyate iti viṣayamukhena pradarśyate --
GK16msabdvvu:6: jātiḥ kriyā guṇaḥ saṃjñā vācyo 'rthaḥ samitadhvaniḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:7: agṛhītasaṅketasya śabdasyārthapratipatter abhāvāt saṅketasahāya eva śabdo
GK16msabdvvu:9: tena samitaḥ saṅketito dhvaniḥ śabdo yatra yo
GK16msabdvvu:11: pūrvam upalabhyatvān na tu viśrāntidhāmatvān mukhya iti prasiddho vācyo 'bhidheyo 'rthaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:13_0: iha yadyapi pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayo vyaktir eva, tathāpy ānantyad vyabhicārāc ca tatra
GK16msabdvvu:13_1: saṅketaḥ kartum na pāryata iti gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādīnām ekārthatvaṃ mā prasāṅkṣīd
GK16msabdvvu:13_2: iti ca śabdānām upādhāv eva saṅketaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:16: siddho 'pi dvividhaḥ padārthasya prāṇaprado viśeṣādhānahetuś ca |
GK16msabdvvu:18: uktaṃ hi vākyapadīye -- “gaur hi svarūpeṇa na gauḥ, nāpy agauḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:23: | ḍitthādiśabdānāṃ antyabuddhinirgrāhyaṃ saṃhṛtakramaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktrā yadṛcchayā ḍitthādiṣv artheṣūpādhitayā saṃniveśyate iti ca saṃjñārūpo yadṛcchātmaka iti |
GK16msabdvvu:24: gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādau catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttir bhāṣye kathitā |
GK16msabdvvu:26: nanu payaḥśaṅkhādyāśrayībhūteṣu śuklādiguṇeṣu yadvaśena śuklaḥ śukla ity abhinnāv abhidhānapratyayau stas tacchuklatvādisāmānyam |
GK16msabdvvu:28: śukasārikādyudīriteṣu ḍitthādiśabdeṣu ca ḍitthādiśabdatvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhidyamāne vā ḍitthādyarthe ḍitthāditvam astīti katham catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttiḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:30: saṃsthānāvasthānapramāṇavarṇair bhede 'pi vyaktīnāṃ śābaleyo gauḥ dhāvaleyo gaur ityādyekapratyayahetutvaṃ jāter eva |
GK16msabdvvu:31: haṃsahārādīnāṃ ghṛtaguḍādīnāṃ śukasārikādyudīritaḍitthādiśabdānāṃ nānāvasthaḍitthādyarthānāṃ ca bhede 'pi haṃsaḥ śuklaḥ, hāraḥ śuklaḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:32_0: ghṛtaṃ pacyate, guḍaṃ pacyate, ḍitthaśabdo ḍitthaśabdaḥ, ḍittho ḍittha ityekākārāvagatinibandhanatvād
GK16msabdvvu:32_1: ekarūpatvam eva guṇakriyāyadṛcchānām iti naitāsāṃ bhinneṣv abhinnābhidhānapratyayahetur
GK16msabdvvu:32_2: jātir ghaṭata iti catvāry eva śabdapravṛttinimittāni ||
GK16msabdvvu:35_0: śabde kuśala ityādau darbhagrahaṇādyayogāt gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ca gaṅgādīnāṃ ca
GK16msabdvvu:35_1: ghoṣādhikaraṇatāsaṃbhavāt mukhyārthasya bādhaḥ, rūḍitaḥ prasiddheḥ tathā gaṅgātaṭa
GK16msabdvvu:35_2: ityāder yeṣāṃ na tathā pratipattis teṣāṃ pāvanatvādīnāṃ tathāpratipādanātmanā prayojanena |
GK16msabdvvu:40: upādānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cety uktā śuddhaiva sā dvividhā || 2 ||
GK16msabdvvu:41: kuntān praveśaya yaṣṭī praveśayetyādau kuntādibhir ātmanaḥ praveśasiddhaye svasaṃyoginaḥ puruṣā ākṣipyante |
GK16msabdvvu:44: anubandhyaḥ” ityādau śruticoditam anubandhanaṃ kathaṃ me syād iti jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate na tu śabdenocyate |
GK16msabdvvu:45: “viśeṣyaṃ nābhidhā gacchet kṣiṇaśaktir viśeṣaṇe” iti nyāyād upādānalakṣaṇā nodāhartavyā
GK16msabdvvu:46: na hy atra prayojanam asti na vā rūḍhiḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:47: vyaktyavinābhāvāt tu jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate yathā kriyatām ity atra kartā, kurv ity atra karma, praviśa piṇḍīm ityādau gṛhaṃ bhakṣayetyādi ca |
GK16msabdvvu:48: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte ity atra ca rātribhojanaṃ na lakṣyate |
GK16msabdvvu:50: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ity atra taṭasya ghoṣādhikaraṇatāyāḥ siddhaye gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārtham arpayatīty evamādau lakṣaṇenaiṣā lakṣaṇā |
GK16msabdvvu:52: anayor bhedayor lakṣyasya lakṣakasya ca na bhedarūpaṃ taṭasthatvam |
GK16msabdvvu:53: taṭādīnāṃ gaṅgādiśabdaiḥ pratipādane tattvapratipattau hi pratipipādayiṣitaprayojanasampratyayaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:54: gaṅgāsambandhamātrapratītau tu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa iti mukhyaśabdābhidhānāl lakṣaṇāyāḥ ko bhedaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:55: sāropānyā tu yatroktau viṣayī viṣayas tathā |
GK16msabdvvu:56: āropyamāṇa āropaviśayaś ca yatrānupahnutabhedau sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyete sā lakṣaṇā sāropā
GK16msabdvvu:59: bhedāv imau ca sādṛśyāt saṃbandhāntaratas tathā |
GK16msabdvvu:60: gauṇau śuddhau ca vijñeyau imāv āropādhyavasānarūpau sādṛśyahetū gaur vāhīka ity atra gaur ayam ity atra ca |
GK16msabdvvu:61: atra svārthasahacāriṇo guṇā jāḍyamāndyādayo lakṣyamāṇā api gośabdasya parārthābhidhānaṃ prati nimittatvam upayāntīti kecit |
GK16msabdvvu:62: svārthasahacāriguṇābhedena parārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante na tu parārtho 'bhidhīyata ity apare |
GK16msabdvvu:63: sādhāraṇaguṇāśrayaṇena parārtha eva lakṣyata ity anye |
GK16msabdvvu:66: lakṣyamāṇaguṇair yogād vṛtter iṣṭā tu gauṇatā iti |
GK16msabdvvu:68: tattve hi mañcāḥ krośantītyādau lakṣaṇā na syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:69: avinābhāve cākṣepeṇaiva siddher lakṣaṇāyā nopayoga ity uktam |
GK16msabdvvu:70: yena gogatajāḍyamāndyādisadṛśajāḍyamāndyetyādy ucyate tena guṇābhedābhyupagame guṇajātiprasaṅgāc catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttir uktā vyāhanyate |
GK16msabdvvu:71: āyur ghṛtam, āyur evedam ityādau sādṛśyād anyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvādiḥ paraḥ sambandhaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:76: kvacit tādarthyād upacāraḥ, yathā indrārthā sthūṇā indraḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:84: sā ca “vaktur vākyasya vācyasya rūpabhedād vibhidyate” |
GK16msabdvvu:86: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kim ucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param |
GK16msabdvvu:87: vidadhad īdṛśam eva sadā sakhe sukhitam āssva tataḥ śaradām śatam ||
GK16msabdvvu:88: bahubhir upakārais tāpyamānasya kasyacid uktir iyam |
GK16msabdvvu:89: ato vaktṛmahimnā mūrkhe bṛhaspatiḍśabdena mūrkhatvam ivāpakāriṇi durjanatvādy atra lakṣyate
GK16msabdvvu:93: nīvīṃ prati praṇihite ca kare priyeṇa sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi ||
GK16msabdvvu:98: na samānadhurādhirohadoṣaṃ sumate ko 'pi kadāpi kartum īṣṭe ||
GK16msabdvvu:99: atra prāṇasamasya vyasane 'pi taṭasthas tṛṇamātram api dātum asamarthaś ca
GK16msabdvvu:101: evaṃ dvikabhedās trayaḥ trikabhedaś caika udāhāryaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:102: dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇam ihāpy asmadgṛhe dāsyasi prāyo naiva śiśoḥ pitāsya virasāḥ kaupīr apaḥ pāsyasi |
GK16msabdvvu:103: ekākiny api yāmi tad drutam itaḥ srotas tamālākulaṃ nīrandhrās tanum ālikhantu jaraṭhacchedā naḍagranthayaḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:104: ity atra prāptaśrīr eṣa kasmāt punar api mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyān nidrām apy asya pūrvām analasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi |
GK16msabdvvu:105: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kim iti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāte tvayy āyāte vitarkān iti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:106: ity atra durvārā madaneṣavo diśi diśi vyājṛmbhate mādhavo hṛdy unmādakarāḥ śaśāṅkarucayaś cetoharā kokilāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:107: uttuṅgastanabhāradurdharam idam pratyagram anyadvayaḥ soḍhavyāḥ sakhi sāmprataṃ katham amī pañcāgnayo duḥsahā ||
GK16msabdvvu:108: ity atra ca nādeyapānīyānayanena parapuruṣasambhogasya naḍagranthalekhanena sambhāvyamānanakhadaśanakṣatānāṃ ca nihnavātmakaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:109: vastu, bhavān harir iti rūpakālaṃkāraḥ, vipralambhaśṛṅgāraś ca raso
GK16msabdvvu:113: ākṣiptasyālaṅkārasya lakṣyatve ca vahnyānayane pātrānayanasya lakṣyatvaprasaṅgāt |
GK16msabdvvu:115: saprayojanāyāṃ ca lakṣaṇāyāṃ tadatirikto vyāpāro 'vaśyam aṅgīkartavyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:117: tac ca na mukhyārthabādhanimittavat pramāṇāntarād boddhavyam |
GK16msabdvvu:123: satyām api vā tasyāṃ niyatasmaraṇaṃ na syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:127: na lakṣaṇā tasmin sati hi sā na tu tadviṣayā |
GK16msabdvvu:130: tasyāpi lakṣaṇe 'navasthāpattir iti na lakṣaṇā syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:135_0: nanu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa ityādisvaśabdād yādṛgarthapratītir na bhavati tādṛśī gaṅgāyāṃ
GK16msabdvvu:135_1: ghoṣa ityādes tad eva prayojanaṃ pāvanatvādidharmākrāntaṃ ca taṭādi lakṣyate iti
GK16msabdvvu:135_2: viśiśṭe lakṣaṇā na tu lakṣite viśeṣāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:136: evaṃ hi taṭādeḥ pāvanatvādīnāṃ ca dharmadharmibhāvaś caturtho vyāpāra urarīkartavyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:138: na ca vyāpārasya lakṣaṇātmano vyañjanātmā vyāpāro bhavati |
GK16msabdvvu:140: tarhi lakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojanaṃ tasmād viśiṣṭam eva lakṣyate |
GK16msabdvvu:145: sāmānyaniṣṭhaś ca saṅketa iti tritayātmanā saṅketabhedena lakṣaṇā sā kathaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ gocarīkuryāt
GK16msabdvvu:147: kiṃca lakṣaṇāyā gocaro lakṣyo na prayojanam |
GK16msabdvvu:151: evaṃ hy abhidhāyā api phalaṃ śabdasya ca vācakasya saṃvid eva phalam |
GK16msabdvvu:152: tac ca vinā vyāpārān na sambhavati |
GK16msabdvvu:153: na ca vyāpārasya vyāpāra iti śabdasyaivāsau vācyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:154: lakṣaṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ ca savyāpārasya phalasyeti tasyās tat kāryaṃ kāryaṃ ca phalam ucyate |
GK16msabdvvu:155: kriyāntaraprāpyasya yāgaphalatvam iva vyañjanaśaktinirvartyasya prayojanasya lakṣaṇāphalatvam
GK16msabdvvu:156: nīlaviṣayasya pramāṇasya yathā nīlaniṣṭhaiva prakaṭatā saṃvid vā phalam tadval lakṣaṇāyās tadviṣayaniṣṭham eva prayojanam |
GK16msabdvvu:158: tena siddham etal lakṣaṇāyā atirikto vyāpāraḥ samāśraṇīyaḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:159: nirūḍhā kācanānyā tu kāryā sā kācid anyathā |
GK16msabdvvu:160: anulomapratikūlādiśabdeṣu kācana sā vācyam arthaṃ parihṛtya lakṣya evārthe vācakavan nirūḍhā
GK16msabdvvu:164: ityādāv andhādiśabdeṣu anupapadyamānatvād vācyam atyantatiraskṛtam iti vicchāyatvasya lakṣitasyāsāmānyatvaṃ vyaṅgyam |
GK16msabdvvu:166: sa puruṣaḥ sa ca jīvati satkṛtaṃ jagati yasya parākramasambhṛtam |
GK16msabdvvu:167: bhramati sūryakaraiḥ saha gām imām abhinavoditapallavitaṃ yaśaḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:170: rephadvayānugatabhramarādiśabdābhidheyatve dvirephaśabdaḥ ṣaṭpade yathā prayujyate tathā kokilādau dvika ityādikā anyathā na prayojyāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:171: uktānvaye ca sā paścāt ihānantyād vyabhicārāc ca vākyasya vākyārtha iva viśeṣarūpe padārthe padasya saṅketaḥ kartuṃ na pāryate iti sāmānya eva saṅketaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:172: ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāvaśāt sāmānyānām abhihitānāṃ satām anvaya iti padārthānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyam
GK16msabdvvu:174: atra pakṣe pūrvam abhidhā tato 'nvayabādhe lakṣaṇā |
GK16msabdvvu:176: devadatta gām ānayetyady uttamavṛddhavākyaśravaṇān madhyamavṛddhau viśiṣṭaṃ vyāpāraṃ karotīti dṛṣṭvā vyutpādyamāno nirvibhāge 'rthe
GK16msabdvvu:178_0: tato yajñadatta gām ānayetyādivākyāntaraprayoge sati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niyatasya
GK16msabdvvu:178_1: niyatārtham avasyatīti sāmānyāvacchādite viśiṣṭa eva padārthe padānāṃ saṅketa ity
GK16msabdvvu:178_2: anvitānām eva satām abhidhānam iti viśiṣṭānāṃ padārthatā |
GK16msabdvvu:179: atra pakṣe abhidhāyāḥ pura ādau lakṣaṇā, viśiṣṭasyaiva padārthatvāt |
GK16msabdvvu:180: dvaye dvayam padāpekṣayābhihitānvayaḥ vākyāpekṣayā tv anvitābhidhānam iti dvayapakṣe dvayam
GK16msabdvvu:184: padeṣu varṇavad vākyeṣu hi padānām anarthakatvam |
GK16msabdvvu:186: kaśābhidhānāt turagasya yathā preṣito 'ham anena dhāvana iti pratibhodeti tadvat pratibhāvaśād viśiṣtavākyāt pratipattir iti saiva vākyārthaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:187: asatyabhūtaprakṛtipratyayādikalpanavad avidyāpade padārthakalpanāyāṃ tūkteṣu pakṣeṣu trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:188: yaś ca sambandho lakṣaṇāyā nimittaṃ taṃ pañcavidham āhuḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:190: vaiparītyāt kriyāyogāl lakṣaṇā pañcadhā matā || iti |
GK16msabdvvu:192: tatsambandhāt tena ṣaṭpado lakṣyate iti abhidheyasambandhanimittatā |
GK16msabdvvu:195: varṣe samasta evaikaḥ ślāghyaḥ ko 'py eṣa vāsaraḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:196: dinair mahattayānveyo yo na pūrvair na cāparaiḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:197: atra prakaraṇavaśād mahāpuruṣaḥ kaścil lakṣyate yasya kule pūrve bhāvino vā puruṣā na samānatvam upayānti |
GK16msabdvvu:202: atra hi chatrisāhacaryād achatrā apy evaṃ vyapadiśyante |
GK16msabdvvu:204: kriyāyogād yathā pṛthur asi guṇaiḥ kīrtyā rāmo nalo bharato bhavān mahati samara śatrughnas tvaṃ tathā janakaḥ sthiteḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:205: iti sucaritair mūrtiṃ bibhrat purātanabhūbhṛtāṃ katham asi na māṃdhātā deva trilokavijayy api ||
GK16msabdvvu:209_0: yathā saṃketena mukhyārthabādhāditritayena ca sahāyenābhidhāyako lakṣakaś ca yathā
GK16msabdvvu:209_1: vā pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekasahagato vivakṣāyā anumāpakaḥ tathā pratibhānair malyavidagdhaparicayaprakaraṇādijñānasāpekṣo
GK16msabdvvu:209_2: vācako lakṣyakaś ca vyaṅgyam arthaṃ dhvaniśabdo vyanakti |
GK16msabdvvu:210: tatra vyaṅgyaḥ padaprakāśyo yathā vāṇiaa hatthidantā kutto ahmāṇaṃ vagghakattīa
GK16msabdvvu:215: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaḥ paloehi |
GK16msabdvvu:216: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi ||
GK16msabdvvu:218: mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyām āvayor nimaṅkṣyasi || ]
GK16msabdvvu:220: lakṣaṇāmūlaṃ yathā -- niśvāsāndha ivādarśa ity udāhṛtam |
GK16msabdvvu:224: rājā duḥśāsanāder gurur anujaśatasyāṅgarājasya mitraṃ kvāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:225: atraite varākā dāsabhāvaṃ gatāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti asmadekaśaraṇāḥ paribhaviṣyanti ityādi dyūtakāle bhavadbhiś cintitam āsīn nāsmakaṃ vismṛtam |
GK16msabdvvu:226: tatra kācit pratikriyā nirvyūḍhā na kiṃ nirvyūḍhā ityādikaṃ tam artham abhivyajya sarvair eva kartā dyūtachalānām ityādibhir vācya evārthe viśramyate |
GK16msabdvvu:232: atra dattasaṃketaḥ puruṣo vānīralatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyam artham avagamayya vācyo 'rthaḥ svaprādhānyenāsti |
GK16msabdvvu:233: na caivam abhidhāyā lakṣaṇāyā vā kaścid avasara iti bhinnam eva dhvananam |
GK16msabdvvu:234: nanu ‘yat paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha'; iti vyaṅgyābhimato 'pi
GK16msabdvvu:236: iha sarvāṇy eva kārakāṇi kārakatvāt savyāpārāṇīti sādhyāyamānāny ato bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe
GK16msabdvvu:237: bhavyāyopadiśyata” ity adagdhadahananyāyena yāvad avahitaṃ tāvad vidhīyate
GK16msabdvvu:240: evaṃ hi pūrvo dhāvatīty aparārthe 'pi tātparyaṃ syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:244: evaṃ ca vācyatve kā vārttā vācyaviparītātmano vyaṅgyasya |
GK16msabdvvu:245: na tu vyaṅgyam anumeyam iti śakyaṃ vaktum |
GK16msabdvvu:246: na hi vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ pratibandhagrahe kiñcit pramāṇaṃ kramate |
GK16msabdvvu:250: evaṃbhūtāyāṃ pramāṇair apratipannāyāṃ hi sāmagryām upapattim anapekṣyāpi samudayamānā pratītiḥ kena nihnotuṃ śakyata iti |
GK16msabdvvu:252: etac cānyatra vistareṇa vicāritam iti saṃkṣepeṇehoktam iti śivam ||
